WorkItem.Description:
For some reason Item 56464 & 63476 can't be seen in the Gear>Wrist list in Rawr. They are both found in the item database in options>edit items and I can't see anything wrong with my filters or the settings in the edit items section...they just don't appear!
 
Tested with 4.0.20.0b downloaded, via browser and downloaded version.
 
Also I see you cant load items from wowhead any more like you use to be able to. (Import>Load Items from Wowhead NIY?) any timescale for this feature to be re-introduced?
 
Apologies if this has been asked before, I have spent 20 mins searching to find the answer and couldn't.
 
Thanks for the great program! Puts me miles ahead compared to my fellow guildies! (Silly maxdps users!)
 
Attached Character XML for my Holydin!
 
Cheers for any help.
WorkItem.Summary: [Healadin] Item 56464 & 63476 can't be found in Gear > Wrist

Comments.Message:
Sorry for the two mistakes, I tried to make my post as clear and professional as possible.

Thanks for the help Jothay! Cant believe I missed that spirit option!

I think you miss-understood one of my questions though. When is the feature to download all items from Wowhead going to be released again? (e.g the whole database, not just specifics).

1) It's Rawr not RAWR
2) We call them Healadins here, not Holydins.
3) You can add all the items from wowhead you want, using the Item Browser... which is a dialog you already opened to see if the items were in the database
4) Both of those items have spirit on them, you need to turn off the Spirit filter on the options pane



** Closed by Jothay 09/03/2011 17:46
Also, I just tried what you said unticking "ignore spirit items" - it does not make a difference. Infact unticking the ignore spirit items button doesn't seem to work for any items.
I don't think we will be implementing that feature again. As it stands, we have an active dev who works almost solely on the item cache between releases.
Un-ticking Ignore Spirit Items doesn't work. Spirit items aren't listed.
